H4BasicMod_releaseNotes:
1.Heroes
Updated eight heroes' Specialties, an additional three heroes affected by new Specialties, a faction heroes get buffed, a new hero joined this game
2.New System
1)Weapon System - There are Three types Weapon Mastery, Axe Mastery, Sword Mastery, and Hammer Mastery.
These different weapons will provide extra Max-Dmg when particular heroes are equipped with them.
2)Shield System - There are Five Level Shields (Lv. 0-Lv. 4), these Shields will provide [Block Ability] to Barbarians and Block Specialty Hero, the Block chance is based on Shield Level.
3.Artifacts
Lions Shield Of Courage - Will Grants this hero a buff
4.Spell
Chain Lightning - The damage will half-decrease with each jump->never decreases anymore!
5.Game Launcher
This is first version of Homm4 Launcher, integrating functions for easier handling. Providing two languages(Simplified Chinese and English)

 You can check more updated details in the Discord Server.
